**Active**

- **container/hash: Map, a generic hash table with custom hash function and equivalence relation** [#69559](https://go.dev/issue/69559)
  - discussion ongoing

  - commented
- **crypto/tls: expose \`testingOnlyDidHRR\` from ConnectionState** [#74425](https://go.dev/issue/74425)
  - commented
- **maphash: drop purego version and establish stronger runtime boundary** [#74285](https://go.dev/issue/74285)
  - discussion ongoing
- **reflect: Add Type.Fields() iter.Seq\[StructField] and Type.Methods() iter.Seq\[Method]** [#66631](https://go.dev/issue/66631)
  - commented
- **runtime/mainthread: add mainthread.Do for mediating access to the main thread** [#70089](https://go.dev/issue/70089)
  - commented
- **runtime: expose \`goid\` and \`gopc\` in \`GoroutineProfile\`** [#59663](https://go.dev/issue/59663)
  - discussion ongoing
- **spec: expression to create pointer to simple types** [#45624](https://go.dev/issue/45624)
  - discussion ongoing
- **x/net/http2: deprecate WriteScheduler** [#67817](https://go.dev/issue/67817)
  - commented

- **cmd/{go,cgo,compile}: change interpretation of relative //line directives** [#70478](https://go.dev/issue/70478)
  - hold for implementation
- **crypto/tls: dynamically reload root certificate authorities** [#64796](https://go.dev/issue/64796)
  - put on hold

  - hold for @rsc

  - put on hold

  - hold for @rsc

  - put on hold
